message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $9000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $8200 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $8800. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
